title: Elevated water front land with views of Rathgama Lagoon
details: Located in a unique, west facing, water front plot, this land is in a truly stunning spot. The land currently has a small house on it that is in need of renovation. The property boasts breathtaking views of the lake and its virgin islands. The elevated land overlooks the lagoon and is populated with mature tropical trees. It is only a 15 minute drive away from the nearest beach and as such offers a huge amount of potential for investors.
